EmailTemplate.name: 2020.09.29 - RMA Email 2 EN.RMA Email 2
EmailTemplate.subject: NEW Grand & Toy Municipal Account
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
Congratulations! Your account has been transferred to be a part of our Grand & Toy Municipal Account Program, which will provide you guaranteed savings across all our product lines including:
- 40% Off Office Supplies - 25% Off Cleaning & Maintenance and Breakroom - 15% Off Paper and Toner
To see your updated pricing all you have to do is log in at www.grandandtoy.com <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/?cmp=EBRMASEANEN2&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> . If you don’t remember your username and/or password, please reach out to me, Sean – your account manager, and I can help you get started. If you have any questions about this account transfer or your login information, please feel free to reach out to me.
Thanks,
Sean Vigneau Account Manager | Western Canada 11522 168 Street NW | Edmonton Alberta Canada | T5M 3T9
Providing you with the products, services and solutions your business needs to be more productive and successful.
If you no longer wish to receive emails from Grand & Toy please click here <[[https://go.grandandtoy.com/Unsubscribe.html]]> to update your preferences.
E-mail: SeanVigneau@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:SeanVigneau@grandandtoy.com]]> | Cell: 780 932 4728
Office Supplies | Interiors & Furniture | Print & Documents | Facility Resources | Technology grandandtoy.com <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/?cmp={{my.token}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The content of this e-mail (and attachments, if any) is privileged and confidential, and intended solely for its designated recipient(s). Any dissemination, distribution or copying of this e-mail, other than by its intended recipient(s), is strictly prohibited. If you have received this e-mail by error, please delete it and notify us immediately by reply e-mail.
